tier_verification: This case appears to be misclassified as tier 1. All claims describe operational scaling, technical optimization, and efficiency improvements of an existing fraud prevention SaaS model. SEON is doing traditional things better (faster processing, lower costs, higher accuracy) rather than doing fundamentally new things. This should be reclassified as tier 1 - the business model remains B2B SaaS fraud prevention software, with AI improving performance but not creating new value creation paradigms.
